qas.question: Who did Chopin play for while she sang?
Who was anonymously paying for Chopin's apartment?
When did Chopin return to Paris?
Chopin accompanied which singer for friends?
Where did his friends found Chopin an apartment in 1849?
Who paid for Chopin's apartment in Chaillot?
When did Jenny Lind visit Chopin?

context: At the end of <a3_0>November<a3_0/>, Chopin returned to Paris. He passed the winter in unremitting illness, but gave occasional lessons and was visited by friends, including Delacroix and Franchomme. Occasionally he played, or accompanied the singing of <a0_0><a4_0>Delfina Potocka<a4_0/><a0_0/>, for his friends. During the summer of 1849, his friends found him an apartment in <a1_0><a5_0>Chaillot<a5_0/><a1_0/>, out of the centre of the city, for which the rent was secretly subsidised by an admirer, <a2_0><a6_0>Princess Obreskoff<a2_0/>.<a6_0/> Here in <a7_0>June 1849<a7_0/> he was visited by Jenny Lind.
